Debugging Console

RainbruRPG provides an in-game debugging console.

It is accessible by hitting the 2 key (between the Tab and Esc keys). The console is case insensitive so Get, gEt, get and GET are valids.

The console syntax.

All the command lines are made like this one :
action object.attribute value
Where action can be set or get.

There is special command :

  • help (or ?) : show a basic help;
  • help object : show all the attributes of the object with a little description;

Examples

Here are some example fonctions :

get core.debug on
set the debug attribute of the object core to on.

Attributes types

The attributes are typed. So, a boolean can't be set to "aze" value.

  • Boolean : on|off
  • Integer : an integer (ex 1, 1200, 45300)
  • Float : a floating point number ex (4, 3.20, 4.02335)
  • String : a string ("aze", "eryull", "").

Error messages

  • Unknown command '...' : the command must be help, set or get;
  • Unknown object '...' : the object doesn't exists;
  • Unknown attribute '...' for object '...' : the attributes you type doesn't exists in this object's space;
  • Type error : 'Obj.aatrb' is of type '...' : the error contains the type of the attribute need.
